name: Reasons for attending community college among employed college graduates reporting a first bachelor's degree and having attended community college, by broad field of major and calendar year of degree: 2019
description: Reasons for attending community college among employed college graduates reporting a first bachelor's degree and having attended community college, by broad field of major and calendar year of degree: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Numbers are rounded to the nearest 1,000. Sum of percentages in reasons for attending community college exceeds total because of multiple response.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates, 2019.
